hooks.pre-commit: osascript -e 'tell app "Finder" to display dialog "Pre commit!"'
hooks.pre-push: osascript -e 'tell app "Finder" to display dialog "Pre push!"'
hooks.post-push: osascript -e 'tell app "Finder" to display dialog "Post push!"'
hooks.pre-receive: osascript -e 'tell app "Finder" to display dialog "Pre receive!"'
hooks.post-receive: osascript -e 'tell app "Finder" to display dialog "Post receive!"'
